import { Menu, Transition } from "@headlessui/react"; import { FC } from "react"; const Dropdown: FC<{ setEditMode: any; removePost: any }> = ({ setEditMode, removePost, }) => { return (
setEditMode(true)} > Edit
removePost()} > Remove
); }; export default Dropdown;
